text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump Yeah, and it's a "phantom", based on what was happening before the spike in coronavirus hit. But parsing such things is well beyond your Bimbo brain, isn't it? Besides, it's not the party line that a sycophant like you hews to. #PressSecBimbo
